query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 1 Since then that Charles of yours, fair Clemence, 2 had enlightened me, he told me of the deceits 3 that his seed was to receive;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 ma disse: «Taci e lascia muover li anni»; 5 sì ch’io non posso dir se non che pianto 6 giusto verrà di retro ai vostri danni.
query.error: **English:** 4 but he said: "Be silent and let the years pass"; 5 so that I cannot say except that just 6 weeping shall come after your losses.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 E già la vita di quel lume santo 8 rivolta s’era al Sol che la rïempie 9 come quel ben ch’a ogne cosa è tanto.
query.error: **English:** 7 And already the life of that holy light 8 had turned to the Sun which fills it, 9 like that good which is so much to every thing.
query.result: 7 Dan sudahlah kehidupan cahaya suci itu 8 berbalik ke Matahari yang memenuhinya, 9 seperti kebaikan yang sangat berarti bagi segala sesuatu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Ahi anime ingannate e fatture empie, 11 che da sì fatto ben torcete i cuori, 12 drizzando in vanità le vostre tempie!
query.error: **English:** 10 Ah, wretched souls and impious deeds, 11 that you twist your hearts away from such good, 12 directing your temples toward vanity!
query.result: 10 Ah, jiwa-jiwa yang malang dan perbuatan-perbuatan yang tidak bermoral, 11 yang memalingkan hati kalian dari kebaikan seperti itu, 12 mengarahkan pelipis kalian ke arah kesia-siaan!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Ed ecco un altro di quelli splendori 14 ver’ me si fece, e ’l suo voler piacermi 15 significava nel chiarir di fori.
query.error: **English:** 13 And behold, another of those splendors 14 approached me, and his desire to please me 15 was evident in his shining countenance.
query.result: 13 Dan lihatlah, salah satu dari cahaya-cahaya itu 14 mendekatiku, dan keinginannya untuk menyenangkan hatiku 15 terlihat jelas di wajahnya yang bersinar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 16 Mata Beatrice, yang terpaku 17 padaku, seperti seseorang yang, dengan persetujuan yang baik, 18 menguatkan keinginanku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 «Deh, metti al mio voler tosto compenso, 20 beato spirto», dissi, «e fammi prova 21 ch’i’ possa in te refletter quel ch’io penso!».
query.error: **English:** 19 "Oh, quickly grant my wish, 20 blessed spirit," I said, "and show me 21 that I can reflect in you what I think!"
query.result: 19 "Oh, cepatlah kabulkan keinginanku, 20 roh yang diberkati," kataku, "dan tunjukkan padaku 21 bahwa aku dapat memantulkan dalam dirimu apa yang kupikirkan!"
